trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Laguna Beach
There were no other sightings in Laguna Beach on or around March 3rd 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was a beautiful clear day here in Laguna Beach Ca...The orbs I have seen before but only one at a time...This was the first time right in front of my house that I saw between 6-8 orbs...One was an orange color, one was pinkish...color the others were just like bright balls....Then towards the north there is a hill and I can see planes taking off...There was a ship of some kind did not get a picture but I got a blurry one of the large ball of light it flashed before it disappeared....Then towards the south a object came up wards and then began to fly south east it was black with light going around flashing as it was flying...This was the most I have ever seen in my life...It was cool...I had a feeling that morning that I was going to have some sightings I just didn't think it was going to be this much...Over in the north every time a plane took off for about an hour an orb a darker one in color would shoot up as the plane was taking off...I am excited...I asked the first orb if it was alone or did it have friends 10 minutes later I saw all the 6-8 orbs hang out and flash and then slowly move upwards and then just gone.... My camera is not very good gotta get a new one but here they are...
Summary: Orbs were first. One then there were 8 all together ship gave off huge bright ball of light the other ship had lights glowing as it flew over my neigborhood a darker orb kept popping up every time a plane took off from John Wayne airport
